mapper.insert: insert into txt ( place_name, written_date, recommend, scope, member_id, text, lat, lng, nickname ) values ( #{placeName}, #{writtenDate}, #{recommend}, #{scope}, #{memberId}, #{text}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{nickname} )
mapper.select: select * from txt where place_name = #{placeName} and lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng} order by recommend desc limit 1
select * from txt where place_name = #{placeName} and lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng} order by written_date desc limit 1
select * from txt where place_name = #{placeName} and lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng} order by written_date desc
select avg(scope) from txt where place_name = #{placeName} and lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng}
mapper.update: update txt set recommend = recommend + 1 where txt_id = #{txtId}
